data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 365,938 lost people in  Granma, Cuba have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Granma, Cuba
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Granma, Cuba honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Granma, Cuba so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Granma who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Manzanillo
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Manzanillo, Granma, Cuba.
Father, help the 94,731 believers in Granma to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 740,969 lost friends and neighbors.
God, we pray both the men and women of Granma, Cuba will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.

data.section_summary:
the state of Granma, Cuba has a population of 835,700.

We estimate Granma has 94,731 people who might know Jesus, 375,031 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 365,938 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 8 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Granma.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

location.name: Granma
location.cities_list: Bayamo, Manzanillo, Bartolomé Masó, Jiguaní, Yara
location.cities_list_w_pop: Bayamo (192,632), Manzanillo (128,188), Bartolomé Masó (53,024), Jiguaní (41,106), Yara (28,944)
